verses.name: Ezra 6:7
verses.text: Let the work of this house of God alone; let the governor of the Jews and the elders of the Jews build this house of God in his place.

verses.name: Ezra 6:8
verses.text: Moreover I make a decree what ye shall do to the elders of these Jews for the building of this house of God: that of the king’s goods, even of the tribute beyond the river, forthwith expenses be given unto these men, that they be not hindered.
